page.title: 20GUNNESS VILLAGE (2)
page.content: There are several clubs. A Parish Council meets once a month; the Youth Club meets weekly; the Women's Institute_ once a month; Whist Drives are held once a week;the Playgroup meets 3 times a week; the Tuesday Club plays cards in the afternoon every fortnight. A Conservative Association meets every month.The Village Hall Committee(raising money for a new hall) meet every month. Both church & chapel have Sunday schools. The travelling shops are the Butcher (2 calls a week) Fishmonger(1 call a week)Fruit & vegetables(1 call a week) Baker(5 calls a week). A mobile library calls every 2 weeks. Sports Competitions are frequent. There are senior and junior cricket teams and senior and junior football teams. In total there are 6 sports teams playing in various local leagues..
